title: GREATEST PUNCH IN ANIME HISTORY!?! - One Piece Episode 395 & 396 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction and review video covering Episodes 395 and 396, focusing on the build-up to and execution of one of One Piece's most iconic moments.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for Episodes 395-396 of the Sabaody Archipelago arc

title: One Piece – Sabaody Archipelago Arc (Episodes 385 – 405) Review
author: David Hogan
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Sabaody Archipelago arc, praising the introduction of the Celestial Dragons as detestable villains and highlighting the emotional impact of the arc's ending. The reviewer gives the arc a 5-star rating.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Sabaody Archipelago arc (episodes 385-405)

title: One Piece: The 10 Best Episodes Of The Sabaody Archipelago Arc (According To IMDb)
author: Suzail Ahmad
description: An article ranking the top 10 episodes of the Sabaody Archipelago arc based on IMDb ratings. Episode 395 is mentioned with a 7.9 rating, noted as focusing on the human auction beginning and the spread of news about Ace's execution.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for episodes throughout the Sabaody Archipelago arc

title: 394-396: 'Rescue Camie! The Archipelago's Lingering Dark History', 'Time Limit – The Human Auction Begins' and 'The Fist Explodes! Destroy the Auction'
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: A first-time watcher's perspective on episodes 394-396, describing the build-up across these episodes as excellent and praising Oda's balance of world-building, character introductions, and plot twists.
